    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      DefaultGeoDevice()
      Creates a new device that will fetch the System's time instead of utilizing a time provider.
      DefaultGeoDevice(TimeProvider timeProvider)
      Creates a new default geo device with the specified time provider.
